title: Opinion on new 2024 rules for flanking

posts.author: DungeonMasterDave
posts.content:
I've been thinking about flanking lately and wanted to get everyone's opinions.

Quick question about flanking that came up in our game last night.

The rules for flanking seem a bit ambiguous to me. On page 123 it states one thing, but then on page 145 it seems to contradict that. How do you interpret this?

What do you all think? Has anyone else had similar questions about flanking?
posts.thread_title: Opinion on new 2024 rules for flanking

posts.author: SorcerousSally
posts.content:
In our last session, we encountered a Lich and tried to use rules to gain an advantage, but it didn't work out as planned.

I think the 2024 changes to rules make it much more balanced compared to before.

How do other DMs balance encounters that involve rules? I find it either makes combats too easy or too difficult.

In my campaign, we had a situation with rules that played out really well. The player used it creatively to overcome a challenge I didn't expect them to solve.
